channel.title: GoogleDrive on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GoogleDrive on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Memo about using Colab Pro for about 2 months (good point / bad point)
item.description: # What is Google Colaboratory A free Jupyter Notebook environment where you can write and run Python code in your browser. There are restrictions on use, but you can also use the GPU. Colab Pro A paid version ($9.99/month) of Google Colaboratory. There are various advantages over the regular version. Currently US only (contract requires US address and credit card). Since I live in the United States, I signed up for Colab Pro at the same time as Launch.
